The Shayzien greaves (5) are platelegs that require 20 Defence to equip, and are part of the Shayzien armour (tier 5) set. In order to receive the armour, players must have 100% Shayzien favour.

They are dropped by the tier 5 soldier at the Combat Ring in the Shayzien Encampment.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-20+6
 Defence bonuses
+23+22+21-4+23

Date Changes
30 June 2021
(update | poll)

The tier 5 Shayzien greaves has had its Ranged Attack bonus increased from -5 to +6.

10 January 2019
(update)

The examine text was modified, the old examine text was "Dress like a tier 5 soldier of the Shayzien House."

[[File:Shayzien greaves (5) detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''Shayzien greaves (5)''' are platelegs that require 20 [[Defence]] to equip, and are part of the [[Shayzien armour (tier 5)]] set. In order to receive the armour, players must have 100% [[Shayzien]] [[favour]].

They are dropped by the [[Soldier (tier 5)|tier 5 soldier]] at the [[Combat Ring (Shayzien)|Combat Ring]] in the [[Shayzien Encampment]].
